title: I legitimately hate that kayn is allowed to kill me in LITERALLY .2 seconds
body: Sure he was ahead but having two items shouldnt mean "hurr durr me one shot"  Like fuck this shitty game and fuck our balance team. Not all of them, of course. But fuck the assholes who dont know how to balance because a) theyre trash *cough* CertainlyT or b) dont fucking play the game they work on *cough* ghost crawler.

replies.body: Might have something to do with him having 23 kills in an 18 minute game. Just saying.
What were his items, did they have any infernals, did you buy any defense, and what level were both of you?

Whatttttttt???? you mean An assassin one shot a  squishy kai'sa?????

The kayn who was extremely ahead,  had 4 1/5 items at 28mins? The kayn who was at least 3-4 levels up at almost all points?


and i can 100% bet he went blue form too.
